description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on November 18, 2022. All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. To carry out the survey and other works for four properties both inside and outside of Montreal. The contact details for the bidding supplier are as follows:
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Legal Surveying Services
#### For the Department of National Defence

**Tender Reference:** WS3658470563
**Publication Date:** October 11, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** November 18, 2022 (14:00 hours, EST)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) to obtain the services of a surveying firm for the preparation of a certificate of location, staking of lots, and preparation of technical descriptions for four properties.

The properties are located in:

*  Montreal City (Longue-Pointe and LaSalle)
*  St-Jean-sur-Richelieu and
*  Farnham, outside of Montreal

The tender is divided into two zones:

* Zone 1: Montreal
* Zone 2: St-Jean-sur-Richelieu and Farnham

**Description of Services:**

* Preparation of a certificate of location for each property
* Staking of lots
* Preparation of technical descriptions

**Solicitation Information:**

* **Trade Agreements:** This tender is open to suppliers who have entered into agreements under the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and other agreements as listed in the attached document.
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* **Contact Information:** Cossette Fontaine, Jessica, (SPAC/PSPC) jessica.cossettefontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice and Attachment:**

The RFP and other relevant documents can be found online at [insert link]. The submission of supporting documentation and bids must be received by November 18, 2022 (14:00 hours, EST) at the latest.

**Important:** Bids submitted after 14:00 hours EST will be declared non-responsive.

#### Tender Status:

This tender is closed, and the results are not disclosed. Suppliers who wish to be considered for future tenders related to this RFP are encouraged to monitor the Government of Canada's procurement opportunities website for updates on new opportunities.  [insert link] 

All communications related to this RFP must be addressed to [insert contact name and address].  All other comments related to this
